# PLAYER::GET_IS_PLAYER_DRIVING_ON_HIGHWAY

## Summary
If the player is driving on a highway, returns true otherwise false

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Appears once in "re_dealgonewrong"
